Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.ClientController

Class Disconnect

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.ClientController.ClientState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.ClientController.Disconnect
public class Disconnect extends ClientState
The client is currently disconnected from the game. A new thread is created to try to reconnect to the game or the main lobby. As soon as a connection is established, the client changes its state.

  • Method Details

    • nextState

      public void nextState(JoinedGameMessage message)
      This method is used when a disconnected client receives a JoinedGameMessage. First, it interrupts reconnection routine, then set ViewState of ClientController to Wait and notifies view. If ClientController.getLocalModel() == null, then it builds a new LocalModel, sets gameName and nickname and manages ListenersManager
      Overrides:
      nextState in class ClientState
      Parameters:
      message - is the JoinedGameMessage to be handled

    • nextState

      public void nextState(AvailableGamesMessage message)
      This method is used when a disconnected client receives an AvailableGamesMessage. First, it interrupts reconnection routine, set ViewState of ClientController to NotGame and notifies view.
      Overrides:
      nextState in class ClientState
      Parameters:
      message - is the AvailableGamesMessage to be handled

    • nextState

      public void nextState(GameHandlingErrorMessage message)
      This method handles a GameHandlingErrorMessage. It sets ViewState in ClientController to NotPlayer if GameHandlingErrorMessage.getErrorType() is Error.PLAYER_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE; otherwise it sets it to NotGame if GameHandlingErrorMessage.getErrorType() is Error.PLAYER_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE ot Error.GAME_NOT_FOUND.
      Overrides:
      nextState in class ClientState
      Parameters:
      message - the GameHandlingErrorMessage to be handled

    • nextState

      public void nextState(NetworkHandlingErrorMessage message)
      This method handles NetworkHandlingErrorMessage. First, it stops reconnection routine and then calls ClientController.handleError(NetworkHandlingErrorMessage) to handle the error.
      Overrides:
      nextState in class ClientState
      Parameters:
      message - the NetworkHandlingErrorMessage to be handled

    • getState

      public ViewState getState()
      Getter for ViewState associated to this state
      Returns:
      the ViewState associated to this state.

    • startReconnecting

      public void startReconnecting()
      This method is used to start reconnection routine

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect()
      This method performs reconnection. It tries to reconnect to server for, at max, ClientSettings.MAX_RECONNECTION_TRY_BEFORE_ABORTING, waiting between one trial and other for ClientSettings.WAIT_BETWEEN_RECONNECTION_TRY_IN_CASE_OF_EXPLICIT_NETWORK_ERROR. For reconnection, it calls NetworkManagementInterface.reconnect(). When reconnection fails, it notifies view and then executes System.exit()
